Reviews.Title: Excellent phone 4 the price
Reviews.Author: GospelXtreme
Reviews.Content: I already owned this phone a while back but unfortunately it was stolen. This is an excellent phone 4 the price. It's main strengh, music. Speakers are as loud as hell and excellent quality, earphones even better. It may take a while to get used 2 the music buttons but not a problem. For a 2mp camera photos are pretty good, but no flash though, but I can live with that. Video is choppy though, but this is an XpressMusic, it's not its purpose. Battery life is incredible, both for music and talking, design is slim enough and color has that cool metallic look, only wished dealer had red or black as well. If you want a great non-Android/iPhone cell, this is the choice.Only drawback, it's imported from Africa, so you need an american charger, but u can get 1 in amazon for less than 3 bucks (Nokia AC-3U Travel Charger).

Reviews.Title: really great!!!
Reviews.Author: aryana
Reviews.Content: Great product and accessories! It is unlocked as labeled and Im using this as my roaming phone. This is similar to my old roaming phone (nokia xpressmusic 5220) which broke down finally ^-^ after 5 yrs of service, so I just removed my micro sd card and sim card from another country and voila! started using this phone with no problem :)

Reviews.Title: Great Cell
Reviews.Author: Alister Godoy
Reviews.Content: A year ago I bought this phone for my father and has not failed at anything! is very convenient to operate. Nokia makes great phones definitely

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: NEVER GET THIS PHONE IT SUCKS, I loved my NOKIA 3500 and I thought that this phone would be great, but it wasn't and I can't believe I wasted the money on it

Reviews.Title: Color blue not the same as shown in picture
Reviews.Author: Conrad
Reviews.Content: The blue color shown in the illustration is dark blue. The phone supplied is a light sky blue. Besides that the phone works great and is unlocked so works with any SIM from any provider.
